keyMoments.title: Robin's Secret Meeting with CP9
keyMoments.description: Robin meets with CP9 members who compliment her on the attempted assassination of Iceburg. They discuss plans to infiltrate Iceburg's home and mention he possesses something they want.
keyMoments.significance: Confirms Robin's involvement with the enemy organization CP9, deepening the mystery of her betrayal and her true motives.

keyMoments.title: Robin Announces Her Departure from the Straw Hat Pirates
keyMoments.description: Robin tells Sanji and Chopper she will not be returning to the crew and confirms she was responsible for attacking Iceburg and framing the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: The pivotal moment where Robin officially leaves the Straw Hat Pirates, setting up the entire Enies Lobby arc and one of the most emotional storylines in the series.
keyMoments.quote: I will not be returning with you. I was indeed guilty for what happened last night as well as forcing the blame on the Straw Hats.

reveals.information: Robin confirms her involvement with CP9 and her responsibility for the attack on Iceburg
Robin refers to herself as someone who 'draws darkness,' suggesting she carries a dark burden

relationships.description: Robin painfully distances herself from Sanji as she announces her departure from the crew.

evolutionMoments.description: Robin tells Sanji she won't be returning to the crew, breaking their crewmate bond.

relationships.description: Robin painfully distances herself from Chopper as she announces her departure from the crew.

evolutionMoments.description: Robin tells Chopper she won't be returning to the crew, breaking their crewmate bond.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Refuses to Believe Robin is Guilty
keyMoments.description: Despite Iceburg's testimony that Robin shot him, Luffy firmly refuses to believe that Robin would try to kill someone.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's unwavering faith in his crewmates, establishing the emotional foundation for the crew's quest to save Robin and understand her true motives.
keyMoments.quote: I refuse to believe that Robin would try and kill somebody.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Commits to Finding the Truth
keyMoments.description: After learning of Robin's confession, Luffy and the crew decide they must determine whether Robin is truly friend or foe.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's leadership and determination to uncover the truth rather than accept Robin's departure at face value.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Witnesses Robin's Departure
keyMoments.description: Sanji and Chopper spot Robin across the river and hear her devastating announcement that she's leaving the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Sanji becomes the bearer of heartbreaking news to the rest of the crew, witnessing firsthand Robin's painful decision.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Chopper Witnesses Robin's Departure
keyMoments.description: Chopper and Sanji spot Robin across the river and hear her devastating announcement that she's leaving the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Chopper experiences the emotional pain of Robin's departure and must relay this information to the rest of the crew.

keyMoments.title: Chopper Reports Robin's Confession to the Crew
keyMoments.description: Chopper explains his conversation with Robin to the crew, prompting their decision to investigate her true intentions.
keyMoments.significance: Chopper's testimony helps the crew understand the gravity of the situation and motivates them to seek the truth.

keyMoments.title: Kokoro Reveals CP9's Existence
keyMoments.description: Kokoro tells Franky about CP9, revealing that this secret organization, not the Straw Hat Pirates, is responsible for attacking Iceburg.
keyMoments.significance: First explicit mention of CP9 to a major character, providing crucial information that helps shift blame away from the Straw Hats and reveals the true antagonists.
keyMoments.quote: The pirates didn't try to murder Iceburg, but an organization called CP9 are the culprits.

reveals.information: Kokoro has knowledge of CP9, a secret government assassination organization

keyMoments.title: Franky Learns About CP9
keyMoments.description: At Blueno's Bar, Franky hears from Kokoro about CP9 and their involvement in the attack on Iceburg.
keyMoments.significance: Franky gains crucial information about the secret organization operating in Water 7, connecting him to the unfolding conspiracy.

keyMoments.title: Franky Reveals He Has No Home
keyMoments.description: When Kokoro suggests he prepare his house for the typhoon, Franky reveals he doesn't have a house anymore.
keyMoments.significance: A character-building moment that reveals Franky's homeless status and adds depth to his background.
keyMoments.quote: I don't have a house anymore.

reveals.information: Franky no longer has a house
